title: Bernie Sanders On Religion: ‘We're All In This Together'
text:

I know that I'd like to think that, but the fact is (IMHO) is that they are just to narrow minded and can't see the Forrest for the trees. I truly believe that when they "speak" in front of one of their gathered crowds, they believe that everyone in the country thinks the same as they do. Certifiable maybe? posted on Was The Benghazi Hearing's Goal To Get The FBI To Indict Hillary? F_cons • 1 min ago

There's no good reason Democrats shouldn't win both houses and the White House. In fact, there's no good reason the Republican Party should still exist at this point. They've been lying about dead Americans nonstop for over fourteen years now. Marilyn Rose • 2 min ago
